definition: all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
to have children/to raise or bring up/to educate

sentences.english: Teacher is a key factor in actualizing education for quality.
sentences.chinese: 教师是实施素质教育的关键因素。

sentences.english: Financial college students' quality education has its special inner regularity.
sentences.chinese: 财经类专业大学生的素质教育有其独特的内在规律性。

sentences.english: Do you think this way of educating could attain the end of“quality education”?
sentences.chinese: 您认为这样能达到素质教育的目的吗？

sentences.english: Sex education among junior middle school students is a recent introduction to the practice of quality-oriented education in China.
sentences.chinese: 初中生青春期性教育是我国素质教育的新领域。

sentences.english: Music education has been playing an important role in the promotion of quality-oriented education.
sentences.chinese: 音乐教育在素质教育中一直发挥着巨大的作用。

sentences.english: We will comprehensively promote well-rounded education.
Quality-oriented education is a topic with distinctive characteristics of the times and important theoretical value.
sentences.chinese: 素质教育是具有鲜明时代特征和重要理论价值的命题。

sentences.english: This article makes a discussion on the contemporary university student education for all-around development question.
sentences.chinese: 本文就当代大学生素质教育的问题做些探讨。

sentences.english: The examination of physical education is an important part in qualities education.
sentences.chinese: 学校体育考试是素质教育运行机制的重要环节。

sentences.english: The classroom teaching is the main channel of quality education.
sentences.chinese: 课堂教学是素质教育的主渠道。

sentences.english: And finally, TMTpossesses a quite powerful function in quality-oriented education.
sentences.chinese: 其五，数学思维训练具有强大的素质教育功能。

sentences.english: Quality education should be focused on improving students' self-studying ability.
sentences.chinese: 素质教育必须着力于学生主体性的培养。

sentences.english: The development student's frontier spirit is an education for all-round development one point.
sentences.chinese: 培养学生的创新精神是素质教育的第一重点。

sentences.english: Interest group is an effective form of quality education in the environment of open education.
sentences.chinese: 兴趣小组是开放教育环境下素质教育的有效形式。

sentences.english: State councilor stresses quality education for overseas students.
sentences.chinese: 国务委员称应加强对海外留学生的素质教育。

sentences.english: So, our country decide to change exam-oriented education to quality education.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我国决定把应试教育转向素质教育。

definition: early education (abbr. for 早期教育[zao3 qi1 jiao4 yu4])
preschool education/abbr. for 幼兒教育|幼儿教育[you4 er2 jiao4 yu4]
to enter the next grade school
International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO)/abbr. for 國際奧林匹克數學競賽|国际奥林匹克数学竞赛[Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Shu4 xue2 Jing4 sai4]
